Aura: Angelic Halo.name: Aura: Angelic Halo
Aura: Angelic Halo.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.w3uGXDVEdbLFZVO0]{Angelic Halo}.

You gain an angelic halo with an aura that increases allies' healing from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} spell. Allies in your halo's emanation who are healed by a heal spell gain a status bonus to Hit Points regained equal to double the heal spell's rank.

Aura: Bless.name: Aura: Błogosławieństwo
Aura: Bless.description:
Zapewniana przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XSujb7EsSwKl19Uu]{Błogosławieństwo}

Błogosławieństwa zza zasłony pomagają twoim kompanom sięgać celu. Ty i twoi sojusznicy zyskujecie premię statusową +1 do rzutów ataku będąc w zasięgu emanacji. W kolejnych rundach, raz na rundę możesz Podtrzymać zaklęcie by zwiększyć prmień emanacji o 10 stóp.

Aura: Protective Ward.name: Aura: Ochronna Bariera
Aura: Protective Ward.description:
Zapewniana przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.lY9fOk1qBDDhBT8s]{Ochronną Barierę}

Emanujesz błyszczącą aurą ochronnej magii. Ty i twoi sojusznicy zyskujecie premię statusową +1 do KP. Za każdym razem kiedy @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.3f5DMFu8fPiqHpRg]{Podtrzymasz} zaklęcie, promień emanacji zmiększa się o 5 stóp do maksymalnie 30 stóp.

Aura: Protector's Sphere.name: Aura: Protector's Sphere
Aura: Protector's Sphere.description:
Zapewniana przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.DH9Y3RQGWO0GzXGU]{Protector's Sphere}

You gain resistance to all damage. Your allies also gain this resistance while in the aura.

Aura: Spiral of Horrors.name: Aura: Spiral of Horrors
Aura: Spiral of Horrors.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.KPGGkyBFbKse7KpK]{Spiral of Horrors}

You emit an aura of terror. Foes in the area are frightened 1 and unable to reduce the condition.

Effect: Albatross Curse.name: Efekt: Albatross Curse
Effect: Albatross Curse.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.93SjFTGJUTTmAt6j]{Albatross Curse}.

You and allies within 30 feet of the target gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attacks against the target.

Effect: Albatross Curse Circumstance Bon.name: Efekt: Albatross Curse Circumstance Bonus
Effect: Albatross Curse Circumstance Bon.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.93SjFTGJUTTmAt6j]{Albatross Curse}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attacks against the target of the Albatross Curse.

Effect: Cinder Gaze.name: Efekt: Cinder Gaze
Effect: Cinder Gaze.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.mOUwbIN1SUp8FyPR]{Cinder Gaze}.

  1. Terrible Danger You gain a +2 status bonus to your next initiative roll.
  2. New Life The next time you take damage, just before taking the damage, you gain temporary Hit Points equal to 1 plus your spellcasting ability modifier.
  3. Vivid Insight (fortune) The next time you attempt a check to Recall Knowledge, roll twice and take the higher result.
  4. Good Fortune (fortune) The next time you attempt a saving throw, roll twice and take the better result.

Effect: Debilitating Terror.name: Efekt: Debilitating Terror
Effect: Debilitating Terror.description: The target takes a –1 circumstance penalty to attack and damage rolls against you.

Effect: Guidance Immunity.name: Efekt: Guidance Immunity
Effect: Guidance Immunity.description: Granted when someone uses @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.izcxFQFwf3woCnFs]{Guidance} on you, rendering you immune to the effect of the spell for the duration.

Effect: Overwhelming Perfume.name: Efekt: Overwhelming Perfume
Effect: Overwhelming Perfume.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.3526YUgCvB5ZsKuX]{Mantle of the Unwavering Heart}

Creatures in the aura can't benefit from the scent ability and are sickened 1 as long as they remain in the aura.

Effect: Revel in Retribution.name: Efekt: Revel in Retribution
Effect: Revel in Retribution.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Eed8QBWBtpufl1iP]{Revel in Retribution}

You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.KAVf7AmRnbCAHrkT]{Reactive Strike} ability.

Effect: Revel in Retribution (Temp HP).name: Efekt: Revel in Retribution (Temp HP)
Effect: Revel in Retribution (Temp HP).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Eed8QBWBtpufl1iP]{Revel in Retribution}

Whenever you successfully hit with a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.KAVf7AmRnbCAHrkT]{Reactive Strike}, you are granted temporary Hit Points.

Effect: Shield Immunity.name: Efekt: Niewrażliwość na Tarczę
Effect: Shield Immunity.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.TVKNbcgTee19PXZR]{Tarczę}

Po użyciu Bloku Tarczą zaklęcie się kończy i nie możesz go rzucać ponownie przez 10 minut.

Spell Effect: Aberrant Form (Chuul).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Aberrant Form (Chuul)
Spell Effect: Aberrant Form (Chuul).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Fu8Ml47ZfXpSYe7E]{Aberrant Form}

Harnessing the power of vile entities, you transform yourself into a Large aberration. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. When you cast this spell, choose chuul, gogiteth, gug, or otyugh. While in this form, you gain the aberration trait. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 13 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +18, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +20, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of aberration you choose:

  • Chuul
    • Speed 30 feet, swim 25 feet
    • Melee 1 claw (reach 10 feet) Damage 2k8+8 bludgeoning, and you can spend an action after a hit to Grab the target.

Wywyższenie (6.)/strong> Your battle form is Huge, and the reach of your attacks increases by 5 feet. You must have space to expand, or the spell is lost. You instead gain AC = 21 + your level, 26 temporary HP, attack modifier +22, damage bonus +13, and Athletics +23.

Spell Effect: Accelerating Touch.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Accelerating Touch
Spell Effect: Accelerating Touch.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zNN9212H2FGfM7VS]{Lay on Hands} if you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.aiHbS8FGNYAQBF62]{Accelerating Touch}.

If the target is one of your allies, they also gain a +2 status bonus to AC and a +10-foot status bonus to Speed for 1 round.

Spell Effect: Adapt Self (Swim).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Adapt Self (Swim)
Spell Effect: Adapt Self (Swim).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.GUnw9YXaW3YyaCAU]{Adapt Self}.

You gain a Swim Speed equal to half your Speed.

Spell Effect: Adaptive Ablation.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Adaptive Ablation
Spell Effect: Adaptive Ablation.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.GoKkejPj5yWJPIPK]{Adaptive Ablation}

You gain resistance the triggering energy type; you gain this resistance after you take the triggering damage, so it applies only to future damage you take during the duration.

Spell Effect: Aerial Form (Bat).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Aerial Form (Bat)
Spell Effect: Aerial Form (Bat).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.NzXpEzcZAjuDTZjK]{Aerial Form}

You harness your mastery of primal forces to reshape your body into a Medium flying animal battle form. When you cast this spell, choose bat, bird, pterosaur, or wasp. You can decide the specific type of animal (such as an owl or eagle for bird), but this has no effect on the form's Size or statistics. While in this form, you gain the animal trait. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 5 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +16, and your damage bonus is +5. These attacks are Dexterity based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy} condition, for example). If your attack modifier for Dexterity-based unarmed attacks is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Acrobatics modifier of +16, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the form you choose:

  • Bat
    • Speed 20 feet, fly Speed 30 feet; precise echolocation 40 feet;
    • Melee 1 fangs, Damage 2k8 piercing;
    • Melee 1 wing (agile), Damage 2k6 bludgeoning.

Wywyższenie (5.)/strong> Your battle form is Large and your fly Speed gains a +10-foot status bonus. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 10 temporary HP, attack modifier +18, damage bonus +8, and Acrobatics +20.

Wywyższenie (6.)/strong> Your battle form is Huge, your fly Speed gains a +15-foot status bonus, and your attacks have 10-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain AC = 21 + your level, 15 temporary HP, attack modifier +21, damage bonus +4 and double damage dice (including persistent damage), and Acrobatics +23.

Spell Effect: Agile Feet.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Agile Feet
Spell Effect: Agile Feet.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.cOjlzWerBwbPWVkX]{Agile Feet}.

You gain a +5-foot status bonus to your Speed.

Spell Effect: Amplifying Touch.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Amplifying Touch
Spell Effect: Amplifying Touch.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zNN9212H2FGfM7VS]{Lay on Hands} if you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Cy5W8U4yN9P1EvBy]{Amplifying Touch}.

If the target is one of your allies, they also gain a +2 status bonus to AC, a +1 status bonus to their attack rolls and deals 1 additional spirit damage on all their strikes until the end of their next turn. In addition, all their Strikes are holy until the end of their next turn.

Spell Effect: Ancestral Form.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Ancestral Form
Spell Effect: Ancestral Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.xEjGEBvTfDJECSki]{Ancestral Form}

You gain resistance to all damage (except force and damage from Strikes with the ghost touch property rune), and this resistance is doubled against non-magical and precision damage.

You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed.

Spell Effect: Ancestral Memories.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Ancestral Memories
Spell Effect: Ancestral Memories.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.dtOUkMC57izf93z5]{Ancestral Memories}

You either gain a status bonus to the next spell attack roll you attempt, or an enemy takes a status penalty to the next saving throw they attempt against a spell you cast.

Spell Effect: Angel Form (Balisse).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Angel Form (Balisse)
Spell Effect: Angel Form (Balisse).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.E3zIZ4pjlOuWeGRz]{Angel Form}

Invoking the celestial realms, you transform into a Medium angel battle form. While in this form, you gain the angel and celestial traits. You have hands in this battle form and can use manipulate actions. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of the form that you choose:

  • AC = 22 + your level. Ignore your armor check's penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 40 temporary Hit Points and weakness 10 to unholy.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you choose. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +25, and you use the listed damage. Melee attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example), and ranged attacks are Dexterity based. If your attack modifier is higher for the given unarmed attack or weapon, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +25, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of angel you choose:

  • Balisse Speed 30 feet, fly 40 feet; Perception modifier of +26 to detect lies and illusions unless your own modifier is higher;
    • Melee 1 scimitar (forceful, sweep), Damage 2k6+12 slashing plus 1k6 fire and 1k6 spirit.

Wywyższenie (9.)/strong> Your battle form is Large. You must have space to expand, or the spell is lost. You instead gain 60 temporary Hit Points, weakness 15 to unholy, attack modifier +30, damage bonus +20, and Athletics +33.

Spell Effect: Angel Form (Choral).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Angel Form (Choral)
Spell Effect: Angel Form (Choral).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.E3zIZ4pjlOuWeGRz]{Angel Form}

If your attack modifier is higher for the given unarmed attack or weapon, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +25, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of angel you choose:

  • Choral Speed 30 feet, fly 40 feet; +1 status bonus to AC and saves against sonic and auditory;
    • Melee 1 fist (agile), Damage 2k6+12 bludgeoning plus 1k6 spirit;
    • Ranged 1 piercing hymn (range 90 feet), Damage 1k6+12 sonic plus 1k6 spirit, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Ogłuchły} for 1 round on a critical hit.

Spell Effect: Angel Form (Monadic Deva).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Angel Form (Monadic Deva)
Spell Effect: Angel Form (Monadic Deva).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.E3zIZ4pjlOuWeGRz]{Angel Form}

Invoking the celestial realms, you transform into a Medium angel battle form. While in this form, you gain the angel and celestial traits. You have hands in this battle form and can use manipulate actions. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of the form that you choose:

  • AC = 22 + your level. Ignore your armor check's penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 40 temporary Hit Points and weakness 10 to unholy.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you choose. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +25, and you use the listed damage. Melee attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example), and ranged attacks are Dexterity based. If your attack modifier is higher for the given unarmed attack or weapon, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +25, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of angel you choose:

  • Monadic Deva Speed 30 feet, fly 40 feet; +2 status bonus on saves against death effects and effects that manipulate souls;
    • Melee 1 holy mace (shove), Damage 2k6+12 bludgeoning plus 1k6 force and 1k6 spirit.

Wywyższenie (9.)/strong> Your battle form is Large. You must have space to expand, or the spell is lost. You instead gain 60 temporary Hit Points, weakness 15 to unholy, attack modifier +30, damage bonus +20, and Athletics +33.

Spell Effect: Angelic Halo.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Angelic Halo
Spell Effect: Angelic Halo.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.jPZXZjetdauqYuEH]{Aura: Angelic Halo}.

If you are healed by a heal spell, you gain a status bonus to Hit Points regained equal to double the heal spell's rank.

Spell Effect: Angelic Wings.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Angelic Wings
Spell Effect: Angelic Wings.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.kRsmUlSWhi6PJvZ7]{Angelic Wings}

Wings of pure light spread out from your back, granting you a fly Speed equal to your Speed. Your wings cast bright light in a 30-foot radius.

Spell Effect: Anima Invocation.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Anima Invocation
Spell Effect: Anima Invocation.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.X0t0gr7S7CeCt2Q5]{Anima Invocation (Modified)}

Krytyczny Sukces You gain full access to your own potential for 1 day. You gain resistance 10 to all damage and a +4 status bonus to saves against effects created by evil creatures. Your Strikes gain the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Duchowego Dotyku} rune and deal an additional @Damage[1d10[spirit]] damage. You are immune to the soul-draining effect within Alseta's Landing.

Sukces You tap into your own potential for 1 day. You gain resistance 5 to all damage and a +2 status bonus to saves against effects created by evil creatures. Your Strikes gain the effects of the ghost touch rune and deal an additional @Damage[1[spirit]] damage. You are immune to the soul-draining effect within Alseta's Landing.

Spell Effect: Animal Feature.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Animal Feature
Spell Effect: Animal Feature.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.vGEgI8e7AW6FQ3tP]{Animal Feature}

Without fully transforming your body, you gain one animalistic feature.

Spell Effect: Animal Feature (Claws).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Animal Feature (Claws)
Spell Effect: Animal Feature (Claws).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.vGEgI8e7AW6FQ3tP]{Animal Feature}

You gain a claw attack that deals 1k6 slashing damage and has the agile, finesse, and unarmed traits.

Spell Effect: Animal Feature (Fish Tail).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Animal Feature (Fish Tail)
Spell Effect: Animal Feature (Fish Tail).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.vGEgI8e7AW6FQ3tP]{Animal Feature}.

You gain a Swim Speed equal to your land Speed.

Spell Effect: Animal Feature (Jaws).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Animal Feature (Jaws)
Spell Effect: Animal Feature (Jaws).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.vGEgI8e7AW6FQ3tP]{Animal Feature}

You gain a jaws attack that deals 1k8 piercing damage and has the unarmed trait.

Spell Effect: Animal Feature (Wings).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Animal Feature (Wings)
Spell Effect: Animal Feature (Wings).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.vGEgI8e7AW6FQ3tP]{Animal Feature}.

You gain a Fly Speed equal to your land Speed.

Spell Effect: Animal Form (Ape).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Animal Form (Ape)
Spell Effect: Animal Form (Ape).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wp09USMB3GIW1qbp]{Animal Form}

You call upon primal energy to transform yourself into a Medium animal battle form. When you first cast this spell, choose a form.

You can decide the specific type of animal (such as lion or snow leopard for cat), but this has no effect on the form's Size or statistics. While in this form, you gain the animal trait. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 16 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 5 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision and imprecise scent 30 feet.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +9, and your damage bonus is +1. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack bonus is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +9, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of animal you choose:

  • Ape
    • Speed 25 feet, climb Speed 20 feet;
    • Melee 1 fist, Damage 2k6 bludgeoning.

Wywyższenie (3.)/strong> You instead gain 10 temporary HP, AC = 17 + your level, attack modifier +14, damage bonus +5, and Athletics +14.

Wywyższenie (4.)/strong> Your battle form is Large and your attacks have 10-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 15 temporary HP, AC = 18 + your level, attack modifier +16, damage bonus +9, and Athletics +16.

Wywyższenie (5.)/strong> Your battle form is Huge and your attacks have 15-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 20 temporary HP, AC = 18 + your level, attack modifier +18, damage bonus +7 and double the number of damage dice, and Athletics +20.

Wywyższenie (3.) You instead gain 10 temporary HP, AC = 17 + your level, attack modifier +14, damage bonus +5, and Athletics +14.

Wywyższenie (4.) Your battle form is Large and your attacks have 10-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 15 temporary HP, AC = 18 + your level, attack modifier +16, damage bonus +9, and Athletics +16.

Wywyższenie (5.) Your battle form is Huge and your attacks have 15-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 20 temporary HP, AC = 18 + your level, attack modifier +18, damage bonus +7 and double the number of damage dice, and Athletics +20.

Spell Effect: Animal Form (Seal).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Animal Form (Seal)
Spell Effect: Animal Form (Seal).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wp09USMB3GIW1qbp]{Animal Form}

You call upon primal energy to transform yourself into a Medium animal battle form. When you first cast this spell, choose a form.

You can decide the specific type of animal (such as lion or snow leopard for cat), but this has no effect on the form's Size or statistics. While in this form, you gain the animal trait. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 16 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 5 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision and imprecise scent 30 feet.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +9, and your damage bonus is +1. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack bonus is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +9, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of animal you choose:

  • Seal

    • Speed 20 feet, swim Speed 30 feet;
    • Melee 1 jaws (grapple), Damage 2k6 piercing;
    • can hold your breath for the duration of the transformation.

Wywyższenie (3.) You instead gain 10 temporary HP, AC = 17 + your level, attack modifier +14, damage bonus +5, and Athletics +14.

Wywyższenie (4.) Your battle form is Large and your attacks have 10-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 15 temporary HP, AC = 18 + your level, attack modifier +16, damage bonus +9, and Athletics +16.

Wywyższenie (5.) Your battle form is Huge and your attacks have 15-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 20 temporary HP, AC = 18 + your level, attack modifier +18, damage bonus +7 and double the number of damage dice, and Athletics +20.

Spell Effect: Community Repair.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Community Repair
Spell Effect: Community Repair.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.oND3oFBjxrhyVvyG]{Community Repair}

Krytyczny Sukces The public work is restored to its prior construction, and it takes on further qualities, encouraged by the thoughts of the community. For the next week, while a caster is within 60 feet of the site of the ritual, they receive a +1 status bonus to Will saves against emotion effects and a +10-foot status bonus to their Speeds.

Krytyczna Porażka The public work refuses to repair itself, and the memories of the community members are soured in response to the botched ritual. For the next week, while a caster is within 60 feet of the site of the ritual, they cannot receive any benefit from beneficial emotion effects, and they take a –10-foot status penalty to their Speeds as their movement slows to a morose crawl.

2.label: Within 60 feet of a Community Repair Ritual

4.text: You cannot benefit from emotion effects.

Spell Effect: Community Repair (Critical.description: The public work refuses to repair itself, and the memories of the community members are soured in response to the botched ritual. For the next week, while a caster is within 60 feet of the site of the ritual, they cannot receive any benefit from beneficial emotion effects, and they take a –10-foot status penalty to their Speeds as their movement slows to a morose crawl.

0.label: Within 60 feet of a critically failed Community Repair Ritual

2.text: You cannot benefit from emotion effects.

3.text: You cannot benefit from emotion effects.

0.label: Within 60 feet of a critically succeeded Community Repair Ritual

Spell Effect: Competitive Edge.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Competitive Edge
Spell Effect: Competitive Edge.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.NOB92Wpn7jXvtyVW]{Competitive Edge}.

You gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and skill checks. If an enemy within 20 feet critically succeeds at an attack roll or skill check, your status bonus increases to +3 attack rolls or that specific skill check (whichever the foe critically succeeded at) for 1 round.

Wywyższenie (7.)/strong> Increase the base bonus to +2 and the increased bonus after an enemy critically succeeds to +4.

0.label: An enemy within 20 feet critically succeeds at an attack or skill roll

Spell Effect: Conductive Weapon.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Elektryzacja Broni
Spell Effect: Conductive Weapon.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.fkUCvynklBGb4LaI]{Elektryzację Broni}

Cel staje się bronią porażenia +1. Jeśli cel ataku bronią nosi metalowy pancerz lub składa się w większości z metalu, kość obrażeń od elektryczności z runy porażenia wynosi 1k12.

Spell Effect: Contagious Idea (Pleasant.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Contagious Idea (Pleasant Thought)
Spell Effect: Contagious Idea (Pleasant.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dby1eQ7y5dXBWlyc]{Contagious Idea}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to the spell rank.

Spell Effect: Corrosive Body.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Corrosive Body
Spell Effect: Corrosive Body.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9aFg4EuOBVz0i3Lb]{Corrosive Body}

You exhale corrosive gas, and acidic secretions coat your skin as you transform into a being of living acid. You gain acid immunity. Any creature that touches you or damages you with an unarmed melee attack or non-reach melee weapon takes @Damage[3d6[acid]] damage, and your unarmed attacks deal 1k4 additional acid damage. The first time each round that you deal acid damage to a creature in this way, you gain [[/r 3d6 #Temporary Hit Points]] temporary Hit Points as your body digests the eroded material and transforms it into a protective acid. When the spell ends, any remaining temporary HP expires as well. Your acid spells deal one additional die of acid damage (of the same damage die the spell uses). You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gISYsBFby1TiXfBt]{Rozprysk Kwasu} as an innate spell; the splash damage affects all creatures within 15 feet instead of the normal 5 feet.

Wywyższenie (9.)/strong> Creatures touching you take @Damage[4d6[acid]] damage instead of 3k6, your unarmed attacks deal 2k4 additional acid damage, and you gain [[/r 5d6 #Temporary Hit Points]] temporary Hit Points.

Spell Effect: Corrosive Body (Heightened.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Corrosive Body (Heightened 9.)
Spell Effect: Corrosive Body (Heightened.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9aFg4EuOBVz0i3Lb]{Corrosive Body}

You exhale corrosive gas, and acidic secretions coat your skin as you transform into a being of living acid. You gain acid immunity. Any creature that touches you or damages you with an unarmed melee attack or non-reach melee weapon takes @Damage[4d6[acid]] damage, and your unarmed attacks deal 2k4 additional acid damage. The first time each round that you deal acid damage to a creature in this way, you gain [[/r 5d6 #Temporary Hit Points]]{5k6 temporary Hit Points} as your body digests the eroded material and transforms it into a protective acid. When the spell ends, any remaining temporary HP expires as well. Your acid spells deal one additional die of acid damage (of the same damage die the spell uses). You can cast acid splash as an innate spell; the splash damage affects all creatures within 15 feet instead of the normal 5 feet.

Spell Effect: Cosmic Form (Moon).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Cosmic Form (Moon)
Spell Effect: Cosmic Form (Moon).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IHUs4qn27RrdFQ5Y]{Cosmic Form}

You recreate your form entirely out of cosmic energy, transforming into a Large battle form. You must have enough space to expand into, or the spell is lost. When you cast this spell, choose to take on the powers of the moon or the sun. You have hands in this battle form and can use manipulate actions. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of the form that you choose:

  • AC = 21 + your level. Ignore your armor check's penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +25, and you use the listed damage. The melee attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example), and the ranged attacks are Dexterity based. If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +25, unless your own is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the stellar body:

  • Moon Speed 30 feet, fly 50 feet;
    • Melee 1 fist (agile, reach 10 feet), Damage 2k4+10 bludgeoning plus 1k6 fire;
    • Ranged 1 moonbeam (range 90 feet), Damage 2k4+10 fire; this form's fire damage is silver for resistances, weaknesses, and the like;
    • On a critical hit with either Strike, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 2} for 1 round.

Spell Effect: Cosmic Form (Sun).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Cosmic Form (Sun)
Spell Effect: Cosmic Form (Sun).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IHUs4qn27RrdFQ5Y]{Cosmic Form}

You recreate your form entirely out of cosmic energy, transforming into a Large battle form. You must have enough space to expand into, or the spell is lost. When you cast this spell, choose to take on the powers of the moon or the sun. You have hands in this battle form and can use manipulate actions. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of the form that you choose:

  • AC = 21 + your level. Ignore your armor check's penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +25, and you use the listed damage. The melee attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example), and the ranged attacks are Dexterity based. If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +25, unless your own is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the stellar body:

  • Sun Speed 30 feet, fly 50 feet;
    • Melee 1 fist (agile, reach 10 feet), Damage 2k6+10 fire plus 1k6 persistent fire;
    • Ranged 1 sunbeam (range 90 feet), Damage 1k6+10 fire plus 1k6 persistent fire;
    • on a critical hit with either Strike, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony} for 1 round.

Spell Effect: Countless Eyes.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Countless Eyes
Spell Effect: Countless Eyes.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ykyKclKTCMp2SFXa]{Countless Eyes}.

The subject can't be flanked for the spell's duration. In addition, when the subject succeeds when Seeking, it critically succeeds instead.

Spell Effect: Courageous Anthem.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Hymn Odwagi
Spell Effect: Courageous Anthem.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IAjvwqgiDr3qGYxY]{Hymn Odwagi}

Zyskujesz premię statusową +1 do rzutów ataku, rzutów obrażeń oraz rzutów obronnych przeciw efektom strachu.

Spell Effect: Daemon Form (Ceustodaemon).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Daemon Form (Ceustodaemon)
Spell Effect: Daemon Form (Ceustodaemon).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.aSDfGcUOUVGU5m1g]{Daemon Form}

You infuse yourself with the corrupting death and pure malevolence of Abaddon, transforming into a Large daemon battle form. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. When you cast this spell you choose either ceustodaemon, leukodaemon, meladaemon, or piscodaemon. The battle form is Medium if you choose ceustodaemon. While in this form, you gain the daemon and fiend traits. You have hands in this battle form and can use manipulate actions. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of the form that you choose:

  • AC = 21 + your level. Ignore your armor check's penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 15 temporary Hit Points and weakness 5 to holy.
  • A +2 status bonus to all saving throws against death effects.
  • Resistance 10 to poison.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +21, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +23, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of Daemon you choose:

  • Ceustodaemon Speed 25 feet;
    • Melee 1 jaws (reach 10 feet), Damage 2k10+10 piercing plus 1k6 spirit;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile, reach 10 feet), Damage 2k6 slashing plus 1k6 spirit;
    • any successful jaws or claw Strike deals an additional 1k6 damage, and you take the same amount of damage.

Spell Effect: Darkvision (24 hours).description: You grant yourself supernatural sight in areas of darkness. You gain darkvision.

Spell Effect: Death Knell.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Death Knell
Spell Effect: Death Knell.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.dLdRqT6UxTKlsPgp]{Death Knell}

Spell Effect: Death Ward.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Death Ward
Spell Effect: Death Ward.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.YvXKGlHOt7mdW2jZ]{Death Ward}.

You are shielded from void energy, you gain a +4 status bonus to saves against death and void effects.

Spell Effect: Demon Form (Babau).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Demon Form (Babau)
Spell Effect: Demon Form (Babau).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.dKbv80rlAWVpz83C]{Demon Form}

You corrupt yourself with the sin of the Abyss, transforming into a Medium demon battle form. When you cast this spell, choose babau, hezrou, nabasu, or vrock. If you choose hezrou, the battle form is Large and you must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. While in this form, you gain the demon and fiend traits. You have hands in this battle form and can use manipulate actions. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of the form that you choose:

  • AC = 20 + your level. Ignore your armor check's penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 30 temporary Hit Points, weakness 5 to cold iron, and weakness 5 to holy.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +22, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example). If your attack modifier is higher for the given unarmed attack or weapon, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +23, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of demon you choose:

  • Babau Speed 25 feet;
    • Melee 1 longspear (reach 10 feet), Damage 2k8+10 piercing plus 1k6 spirit;
    • Melee 1 jaws, Damage 2k10 piercing plus 1k6 spirit;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile), Damage 2k4 slashing plus 1k6 spirit;
    • all Strikes deal 2k6 additional precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Opuszczona Garda} creatures.

Spell Effect: Devil Form (Barbazu).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.dR53f0p15EW7D0xC]{Devil Form}

You bind yourself to the power of Hell, transforming into a Medium devil battle form. When you cast this spell, choose barbazu, erinys, osyluth, or sarglagon. If you choose osyluth or sarglagon, the battle form is Large and you must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. While in this form you gain the devil and fiend traits. You have hands in this battle form and can use manipulate actions. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of the form that you choose:

  • AC = 22 + your level. Ignore your armor check's penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 5 temporary Hit Points, resistance 5 to physical damage (except silver), and weakness 5 to holy.
  • Resistance 10 to fire.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +20, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example). If your attack modifier is higher for the given unarmed attack or weapon, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +23, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of devil you choose:

  • Barbazu Speed 35 feet;

Spell Effect: Dinosaur Form (Ankylosauru.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Dinosaur Form (Ankylosaurus)
Spell Effect: Dinosaur Form (Ankylosauru.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.KhM8MhoUgoUjBMIz]{Dinosaur Form}

You channel the primal forces of nature to transform into a Large animal battle form, specifically that of a powerful and terrifying dinosaur. You must have space to expand or the spell is lost.

You can decide the specific type of animal, but this has no effect on the form's Size or statistics. While in this form, you gain the animal and dinosaur traits. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 15 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision and imprecise scent 30 feet.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +16, and your damage bonus is +9. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +18, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the form you choose:

  • Ankylosaurus
    • Speed 25 feet;
    • Melee 1 tail (backswing, reach 10 feet), Damage 2k6 bludgeoning;
    • Melee 1 foot, Damage 2k6 bludgeoning.

Wywyższenie (5.)/strong> Your battle form is Huge and your attacks have 15-foot reach, or 20-foot reach if they started with 15-foot reach. You instead gain 20 temporary HP, an attack modifier of +18, a damage bonus of +6, double the damage dice, and Athletics +21.

Wywyższenie (7.)/strong> Your battle form is Gargantuan and your attacks have 20-foot reach, or 25-foot reach if they started with 15-foot reach. You instead gain AC = 21 + your level, 25 temporary HP, an attack modifier of +25, a damage bonus of +15, double the damage dice, and Athletics +25.

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 15 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision and imprecise scent 30 feet.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +16, and your damage bonus is +9. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +18, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the form you choose:

  • Brontosaurus
    • Speed 25 feet;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 15 feet), Damage 2k6 bludgeoning;
    • Melee 1 foot, Damage 2k8 bludgeoning.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.z8bHh8KVttslQIU9]{Distracting Decoy}

Porażka The creature is off-guard until the start of your next turn.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the creature also takes a –2 circumstance penalty to attacks while it's off-guard.

Spell Effect: Divine Vessel.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Divine Vessel
Spell Effect: Divine Vessel.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.hiVL8qsnTJtpouw0]{Divine Vessel}

You accept otherworldly energies into your body; while you are still recognizably yourself, you gain the features of one of your deity's servitors. Choose an alignment your deity has (chaotic, evil, good, or lawful). You can't cast this spell if you don't have a deity or your deity is true neutral. This spell gains the trait of the alignment you chose.

If you were Medium or smaller, you become Large, as the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge}. You must have space to expand into, or the spell is lost. You also gain the following benefits.

  • 40 temporary Hit Points.
  • A fly Speed equal to your Speed.
  • Weakness 10 to lawful.
  • A +1 status bonus to saves against spells.
  • Darkvision.
  • Your unarmed attacks and weapons deal 1 additional spirit damage.
  • You gain a bite unarmed attack that deals 2k10 piercing damage.

Spell Effect: Dragon Form (Adamantine).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Dragon Form (Adamantine)
Spell Effect: Dragon Form (Adamantine).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.5c692cCcTDXjSEzk]{Dragon Form}

Calling upon powerful transformative magic, you gain a Large dragon battle form. You must have space to expand or the spell is lost. While in this form, you gain the dragon trait. You have hands in this battle form and can take manipulate actions. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 10 temporary Hit Points.
  • Speed 40 feet, fly Speed 100 feet.
  • Resistance 10 against the damage type of your breath weapon (see below).
  • Darkvision and imprecise scent 60 feet.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +22, and your damage bonus is +6. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead. See below for more on these attacks.
  • Athletics modifier of +23, unless your own modifier is higher.
  • Breath Weapon 2 (primal, bludgeoning) The shape, damage, and damage type of your breath weapon depend on your specific dragon form (see below). A creature in the area attempts a @Check[reflex|against:spell|basic] save against your spell DC. This is a Reflex save unless stated otherwise in the special ability description for your specific dragon form. Once activated, your breath weapon can't be used again for [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1k4 rounds}. Your breath weapon has the trait corresponding to the type of damage it deals.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of dragon you choose:

  • Adamantine
    • Melee 1 jaws, Damage 2k12 piercing plus 2k6 bludgeoning;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile), Damage 3k10 slashing;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 10 feet), Damage 3k10 bludgeoning;
    • breath weapon 30-foot cone, @Damage[10d6[bludgeoning]]

Wywyższenie (8.) Your battle form is Huge, you gain a +20-foot status bonus to your fly Speed, and your attacks have 10-foot reach (or 15-foot reach if they previously had 10-foot reach). You instead gain AC = 21 + your level, 15 temporary HP, an attack modifier of +28, a damage bonus of +12, Athletics +28, and a +14 status bonus to breath weapon damage (@Damage[(6d10+14)[bludgeoning]] damage).

Spell Effect: Draw the Lightning.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Draw the Lightning
Spell Effect: Draw the Lightning.description:
Calling out to the skies, you summon a bolt of lightning to strike through a foe above you and down into your weapon or your body, charging it with electrical power. You must hold your weapon or an empty hand aloft as part of this spell's somatic component. When you do, a bolt of lightning descends from a storm cloud in the air above your and through the target, dealing 3k12 electricity damage with a basic Reflex save. For the rest of the spell's duration, your first Strike each round with the weapon you held aloft (or with your unarmed attacks if you held an empty hand aloft) deals an additional 1k12 electricity damage.

The spell creates its own storm cloud if necessary, so you can cast draw the lightning anywhere, even underground. If draw the lightning is cast outside under a cloudy or stormy sky, increase the bolt's damage by 2k12.

Wywyższenie (8.)/strong> The damage dealt to the initial target increases by 4k12, and the additional damage dealt on the first Strike each turn increases by 1k12.

Spell Effect: Element Embodied (Air).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Element Embodied (Air)
Spell Effect: Element Embodied (Air).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.vQMAdnIwnV9prPiG]{Element Embodied}

Drawing upon the deepest wells of magic in an elemental plane, you transform into a spectacular elemental. You can choose between an air elemental, earth elemental, fire elemental, or water elemental. Your battle form is Gargantuan, and you must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. While in this form, you gain the elemental trait and the trait for the element you choose. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 25 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 30 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +34, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Dexterity based if you choose an air or fire elemental, or Strength based if you choose an earth or water elemental. (This distinction doesn't change the statistics, but matters for the enfeebled and clumsy conditions, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Acrobatics modifier of +36 for air or fire elemental or Athletics modifier of +36 for earth or water elemental, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of elemental you choose:

  • Air Elemental fly Speed 80 feet;
    • High Winds (air, aura) 30 feet. Air within the emanation is difficult terrain for flying creatures that don't have the air trait;
    • Swiftness Your movement doesn't trigger reactions;
    • Melee 1 gust (reach 25 feet), Damage 3k12+11 bludgeoning plus @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.t6cx9FOODmeZQNYl]{Push} 10 feet;
    • Ranged 1 lightning lash (range increment 80 feet), Damage 3k12+4 electricity.

Drawing upon the deepest wells of magic in an elemental plane, you transform into a spectacular elemental. You can choose between an air elemental, earth elemental, fire elemental, or water elemental. Your battle form is Gargantuan, and you must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. While in this form, you gain the elemental trait and the trait for the element you choose. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 25 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 30 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +34, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Dexterity based if you choose an air or fire elemental, or Strength based if you choose an earth or water elemental. (This distinction doesn't change the statistics, but matters for the enfeebled and clumsy conditions, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Acrobatics modifier of +36 for air or fire elemental or Athletics modifier of +36 for earth or water elemental, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of elemental you choose:

  • Wood Elemental 30 feet, climb 35 feet; resistance 5 to physical; weakness to axes 10;
    • Lush Growth (aura, wood) 30 feet. Ground in the area is difficult terrain, and any time a creature in the area regains HP from a healing vitality effect, the aura grants a +5 status bonus to the healing;
    • Woody Toughness You gain 40 temporary Hit Points when you choose this form instead of 30;
    • Melee 1 branch (reach 25 feet), Damage 3k10+18 bludgeoning;
    • Ranged 1 seed (range increment 40 feet), Damage 4k8+6 bludgeoning.

Spell Effect: Elemental Absorption.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Elemental Absorption
Spell Effect: Elemental Absorption.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9TauMFkIsmvKJNzZ]{Elemental Absorption}

You absorb elemental energy, which you can release as a powerful counterattack. Choose air, earth, fire, or water. You gain resistance 5 to damage dealt by effects with the chosen elemental trait; if you choose water, you also gain resistance to cold damage. As usual, if a spell has a multiple effects, such as a spell that deals both fire damage and bludgeoning damage with superheated rocks, you gain resistance to only the effects associated with the element you chose. Keep track of how much damage you have prevented with this spell.

As a 2-action activity, which has the concentrate trait and the trait matching the element you chose, you can release the stored energy. This deals damage equal to the amount you've stored (maximum 30 damage) to one enemy within 60 feet, with a basic Reflex save. The damage type depends on the element you chose: fire damage for fire; bludgeoning or cold damage for water; bludgeoning or slashing damage for air; or bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage for earth. After releasing the energy, the spell ends. If you do not use the stored energy before the spell ends, the energy is lost.

Wywyższenie (+3)/strong> The resistance increases by 5 and the maximum damage increases by 30.

Spell Effect: Elemental Form (Air).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.1K6AYGisvo9gqdhs]{Elemental Form}

You call upon the power of the planes to transform into a Medium elemental battle form. While in this form, you gain the air trait and the elemental trait. You have hands in this battle form and can take manipulate actions. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 19 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 10 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +18, and your damage bonus is +9. These are Dexterity based. If your corresponding unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Acrobatics modifier of +20; ignore this change if your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of elemental you choose:

  • Air
    • fly Speed 80 feet, movement doesn't trigger reactions;
    • Melee 1 gust, Damage 1k4 bludgeoning.

Wywyższenie (6.)/strong> Your battle form is Large and your attacks have 10-foot reach. You must have space to expand or the spell is lost. You instead gain AC = 22 + your level, 15 temporary HP, an attack modifier of +23, a damage bonus of +13, and Acrobatics or Athletics +23.

Wywyższenie (7.)/strong> Your battle form is Huge and your attacks have 15-foot reach. You must have space to expand or the spell is lost. You instead gain AC = 22 + your level, 20 temporary HP, an attack modifier of +25, a damage bonus of +11, double the number of damage dice (including persistent damage), and Acrobatics or Athletics +25.

Spell Effect: Elemental Gift.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Elemental Gift
Spell Effect: Elemental Gift.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.e36Z2t6tLdW3RUzZ]{Elemental Gift}

Choose an element when you Cast the Spell. The target gains the benefit of that element as described below, and this spell gains that trait's element.

  • Air The target gains a +30-foot status bonus to its land Speed and gains a fly Speed equal to its land Speed without the status bonus.
  • Earth While on the ground, the target gets a +2 status bonus to Fortitude and Reflex saves against effects that would Shove or Trip it, and to saves against effects that would attempt to knock it prone. In addition, the ground adjacent to the target is difficult terrain, and the difficult terrain moves with the target, though the target ignores this difficult terrain with its own movement.
  • Fire The target's melee unarmed Strikes and melee weapon Strikes deal 1k6 persistent fire damage on a hit.
  • Metal The target's Strikes using a metal weapon or an unarmed attack deal an additional 1k4 electricity damage on a hit and get a +1 status bonus to the attack roll if the target is made of metal or wearing metal armor.
  • Water The target takes on a watery sheen, gaining resistance 5 to fire and a swim Speed equal to its land Speed.
  • Wood The target gains a number of temporary Hit Points equal to the spell's rank, then gains half that number of temporary HP at the start of each of its turns.

Choose an element when you Cast the Spell. The target gains the benefit of that element as described below, and this spell gains that trait's element.

  • Air The target gains a +30-foot status bonus to its land Speed and gains a fly Speed equal to its land Speed without the status bonus.

Spell Effect: Elephant Form.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Elephant Form
Spell Effect: Elephant Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zjYQyuBNT5VjV4mz]{Elephant Form}

You channel the primal forces of nature to transform into a Large battle form, specifically that of a powerful and terrifying elephant or similar creature, such as a mammoth, mastodon, or anancus. This spell has the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.KhM8MhoUgoUjBMIz]{Dinosaur Form}, except you gain the following specific abilities instead of the form-specific abilities of dinosaur form.

  • Speed 40 feet;
  • Melee 1 foot, Damage 2k8 bludgeoning.
  • Melee 1 trunk (reach 10 feet), Efekt grabbing trunk;
  • Melee 1 tusk (reach 10 feet), Damage 2k6 piercing.

Grabbing Trunk A creature up to two sizes smaller that's hit by your trunk is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Pochwycony}. If you succeed at your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} check against a creature grabbed by your trunk, you can reposition the creature to another space within your trunk's reach.

Wywyższenie (5.)/strong> Your elephant form is Huge; your trunk and tusk attacks have 15-foot reach, and your foot attack has 10-foot reach. You instead gain 20 temporary HP, an attack modifier of +18, a damage bonus of +6, double the damage dice, and Athletics +21.

Wywyższenie (7.)/strong> Your elephant form is Gargantuan; your trunk and tusk attacks have 20-foot reach, and your foot attack has 15-foot reach. Your AC is 21 + your level and you instead gain 25 temporary HP, an attack modifier of +25, a damage bonus of +15, double the damage dice, and Athletics +25.

Spell Effect: Enlarge.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Powiększenie
Spell Effect: Enlarge.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Powiększenie}

Wzmacniany magiczną mocą, cel wzrasta do rozmiaru Dużego. Jego ekwipunek rośnie razem z nim, ale powraca do naturalnych rozmiarów jeśli zostanie zdjęty. Istota jest niezdarna 1. Jej wysięg zwiększa się o 5 stóp (lub o 10 stóp jeśli cel był początkowo Malutki) oraz zyskuje ona premię statusową +2 do obrażeń w zwarciu. Zaklęcie to nie odnmosi efektu na istotach Dużych i większych.

Spell Effect: Enlarge (Heightened 4th).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Enlarge (Heightened 4.)
Spell Effect: Enlarge (Heightened 4th).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge}

Bolstered by magical power, the target grows to size Huge. Its equipment grows with it but returns to natural size if removed. The creature is clumsy 1. Its reach increases by 10 feet (or by 15 feet if it started out Tiny), and it gains a +4 status bonus to melee damage. The Spell has no effect on a Huge or larger creature.

Spell Effect: Entangling Flora.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Plącząca Flora
Spell Effect: Entangling Flora.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.J6vNvrUT3b1hx2iA]{Plączącą Florę}

ponosi karę sytuacyjną –10 stóp do swoich Prędkości.

Spell Effect: Entropic Wheel.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Entropic Wheel
Spell Effect: Entropic Wheel.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.X4T5RlQBrdpmA35n]{Entropic Wheel}

When you Cast a Spell that deals fire damage, the target also takes cold damage equal to the number of motes in the entropic wheel. When you Cast a Spell that deals cold damage, the target also takes fire damage equal to the number of motes in the entropic wheel. This applies only to the initial damage of the spell, not to any persistent damage or ongoing effects.

Spell Effect: Entwined Roots.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Entwined Roots
Spell Effect: Entwined Roots.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.VDK5cQ94BszDrMiJ]{Entwined Roots}

Spell Effect: Envenom Companion.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Envenom Companion
Spell Effect: Envenom Companion.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gWmLT5SkA0qH2mNE]{Envenom Companion}

You envenom your companion or eidolon's attacks, which drip with highly toxic venom for the spell's duration. The first time each round the target hits a creature with an unarmed Strike that deals piercing or slashing damage, that Strike deals an additional 1k8 poison damage. A creature that is damaged by this poison must attempt a Fortitude save. On a failure, it's also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} for 1 round. This spell can't target familiars.

Wywyższenie (+3)/strong> The poison damage increases by 1k8 and the clumsy value imposed on a failed save increases by 1.

Spell Effect: Euphoric Renewal.description:
You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saves and gain 8 temporary Hit Points.

Wywyższenie (+1)/strong> The number of temporary HP increases by 2.

Spell Effect: Everlight.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Everlight
Spell Effect: Everlight.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ynm8JIU3sc3qUMpa]{Everlight}

The gemstone you touch glows, spreading bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet).

Spell Effect: Evolution Surge.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Gwałtowna Ewolucja
Spell Effect: Evolution Surge.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.lV8FkHZtzZu7Cy6j]{Gwałtowna Ewolucja}.

Zalewasz swojego eidolona energią, powodująć tymczasowoą ewolucje jego zdolności. Wybierz jeden z poniższych efektów:

  • Twój eidolon zyskuje widzenie w słabym świetle i widzenie w ciemności.
  • Twój eidolon zyskuje @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.rqfnQ5VHT5hxm25r]{Węch} jako nieprecyzyjny zmysł o zasięgu 30 stóp.
  • Twój ediolon może oddychać pod wodą oraz zyskuje Prędkość pływania równą jego Prędkości lądowej lub 30 stóp, którakolwiek wartość jest mniejsza. Alternatywnie, jeśli twój eidolon jest zwykle stworzeniem wodnym, może oddychać powietrzem i zyskuje Prędkość lądową równą jego Prędkości pływania lub 30 stóp, którakolwiek wartość jest mniejsza. W obu wypadkach zyskuje cechę ziemnowodności.
  • Twój eidolon zyskuje premię statusową +20 stóp do swojej Prędkości.

Wywyższenie (3.) Dodaj do listy wyborów poniższe opcje:

  • Rozmiar twojego eidolona zmienia się na Duży. Zwiększa to wysięg twojego eidolona do 10 stóp, ale nie zmienia innych jego statystyk. Dzięki specjalnej więzi, która was łączy, możesz ujeżdżać swojego eidolona nie przeszkadzając mu w funkcjonowaniu. Jeśli inna istota spróbuje ujeżdżać twojego idolona, zarówno ty jak i ona odzyskujecie na początku swojej tury w każdej rundzie jedynie 2 akcje, tak jak zazwyczaj ma to miejsce.
  • Twój eidolon zyskuje Prędkość wspinaczki równą jego Prędkości lądowej.

Wywyższenie (5.) Dodaj do listy wyborów opcje z wywyższenia na 3. krąg oraz poniższe opcje:

  • Rozmiar twojego eidolona zmienia się na Wielki. Ma to takie same efekty co dostępna na 3 kręgu opcja zwiększenia jego rozmiaru do Dużego, ale wysięg twojego eidolona zwiększa się do 15 stóp.
  • Twój eidolon zyskuje Prędkość latania równą jego Prędkości lądowej.

Spell Effect: Evolution Surge (Amphibiou.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Evolution Surge (Amphibious)
Spell Effect: Evolution Surge (Amphibiou.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.lV8FkHZtzZu7Cy6j]{Evolution Surge}

You flood your eidolon with power, creating a temporary evolution in your eidolon's capabilities. Choose one of the following effects:

  • Your eidolon can breathe underwater and gains a swim Speed equal to its land Speed or 30 feet, whichever is less. Alternatively, if your eidolon is normally aquatic, it can breathe air and gains a land Speed equal to its swim Speed or 30 feet, whichever is less. Either way, it gains the amphibious trait.

Spell Effect: Evolution Surge (Huge).description:

You flood your eidolon with power, creating a temporary evolution in your eidolon's capabilities. Choose one of the following effects:

Wywyższenie (5.)/strong> Add the options from the 3. kręgu version and the following options to the list of effects you can choose:

  • Your eidolon becomes Huge, instead of its previous size. This increases your eidolon's reach to 15 feet but doesn't change any other statistics for your eidolon. Because of the special link you share, you can ride your eidolon without getting in each other's way. If another creature tries to ride your eidolon, both you and the riding creature each regain only 2 actions at the start of your turns each round, as normal.

Spell Effect: Extract Poison.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Extract Poison
Spell Effect: Extract Poison.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.CLThxp8Qf43IQ3Sb]{Extract Poison}

With the lightest touch, you can siphon the poison from an object and save it for your own later use, making an assassin's blade or politician's wine less deadly while you become all the more so. Attempt a counteract check against one poison you're aware of on or in an object you touch. If you successfully counteract the poison, you negate the object's toxicity and transfer the poison into a weapon you are holding, coating the weapon with a simple but powerful poison. On your next successful attack with that weapon before the end of your next turn, you add 1k6 poison damage per level of the poison you counteracted. On a critically failed attack roll, you lose the extracted poison from your weapon as normal.

Note: Set the level of this effect to the level of extracted poison to get the correct damage.

Spell Effect: Face in the Crowd.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Face in the Crowd
Spell Effect: Face in the Crowd.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.yH13KXUK2x093NUv]{Face in the Crowd}

You gain a +2 status bonus to Deception and Stealth checks to go unnoticed among the crowd, and you ignore difficult terrain caused by the crowd.

Spell Effect: Faerie Dust (Critical Fail.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IkS3lDGUpIOMug7v]{Faerie Dust}

Spell Effect: Faerie Dust (Failure).description:

Spell Effect: False Vitality.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Fałszywa Witalność
Spell Effect: False Vitality.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8ViwItUgwT4lOvvb]{Fałszywą Witalność}

Wzmacniasz swoje ciało energiami, które na ogół używane są do manipulacji nieumarłymi, zyskując tymczasowe Punkty Żywotności.

Spell Effect: Ferrous Form.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Ferrous Form
Spell Effect: Ferrous Form.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.89Hj5QuqvcwVXcqj]{Ferrous Form}

Your body transforms entirely into flexible iron. You gain resistance to physical damage, except adamantine. You're immune to death effects, disease, drained, fatigued, healing, nonlethal attacks, paralyzed, poison, sickened, vitality, and void; any of those conditions you had when the spell is cast are suspended until the spell ends, then return with their remaining duration when the spell ends.

Your fist Strikes have a 1k10 damage die, and your metal spells deal one additional die of damage (of the same damage die and damage type the spell uses).

Spell Effect: Fey Form (Dryad).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Fey Form (Dryad)
Spell Effect: Fey Form (Dryad).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Qu4IThrk1wpONwjT]{Fey Form}

Channeling the mischievous fey, you transform into a fey battle form, which is Medium unless stated otherwise. When you cast this spell, choose dryad, elananx, naiad, redcap, or unicorn. If you choose unicorn, the battle form is Large and you must have space to expand or the spell is lost. While in this form, you gain the fey trait. Unless you choose elananx or unicorn, you have hands in this battle form and can use manipulate actions. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of the form that you choose:

  • AC = 19 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 15 temporary Hit Points and weakness 5 to cold iron.
  • Low-light vision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +16, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Dexterity based. If your attack modifier is higher for the given unarmed attack or weapon, you can use it instead.
  • Acrobatics modifiers of +16, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of fey:

  • Dryad The temporary HP gained increases to 30; Speed 25 feet; weakness 5 to fire;
    • Melee 1 branch, Damage 1k12+8 bludgeoning.

Spell Effect: Fiery Body.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Fiery Body
Spell Effect: Fiery Body.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XS7Wyh5YC0NWeWyB]{Fiery Body}

You become living flame, giving you fire immunity, resistance 10 to precision damage, and weakness 5 to cold and to water. Any creature that touches you or damages you with an unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon takes @Damage[3d6[fire]] damage.

Your unarmed attacks deal an additional 1k4 fire damage, and your fire spells deal one additional die of fire damage (of the same damage die the spell uses). You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.6DfLZBl8wKIV03Iq]{Ignition} as an innate spell; the casting is reduced from 2 actions to 1.

In fire form, you have a fly Speed of 40 feet and don't need to breathe.

Wywyższenie (9.)/strong> Creatures touching you take @Damage[4d6[fire]] damage instead of 3k6, your unarmed attacks deal 2k4 additional fire damage, and you have a fly Speed of 60 feet.

Spell Effect: Fiery Body (9th Level).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Fiery Body (9. Level)
Spell Effect: Fiery Body (9th Level).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XS7Wyh5YC0NWeWyB]{Fiery Body}

You become living flame, giving you fire immunity, resistance 10 to precision damage, and weakness 5 to cold and to water. Any creature that touches you or damages you with an unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon takes @Damage[4d6[fire]] damage. Your unarmed attacks deal 2k4 additional fire damage, and your fire spells deal one additional die of fire damage (of the same damage die the spell uses). You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.O9w7r4BKgPogYDDe]{Produce Flame} as an innate spell; the casting is reduced from 2 actions to 1. In fire form, you have a fly Speed of 60 feet and don't need to breathe.

Spell Effect: Figment.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Wymysł
Spell Effect: Figment.description:

Możesz spróbować Stworzyć Dywersję z pomocą iluzji, zyskując premię sytuacyjną +2 do swojego testu Oszukiwania.

Spell Effect: Fire Shield.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.YrzBLPLd3r9m6t1p]{Fire Shield}

Spell Effect: Flame Dancer.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Flame Dancer
Spell Effect: Flame Dancer.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.p6ebe2PliRkGbmiV]{Flame Dancer}

The target's unarmed Strikes deal additional fire damage. Critical hits with these Strikes also deal persistent fire damage.

Spell Effect: Flame Wisp.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Flame Wisp
Spell Effect: Flame Wisp.description:
Three faintly glowing wisps of fire float around your head. Each time you hit a creature with a Strike, one of the wisps goes hurtling towards that creature, dealing 1k4 fire damage. If you Cast a Spell with the fire trait while you have fewer than three wisps, a new wisp appears.

Wywyższenie (+2)/strong> The damage increases by 1k4.

Spell Effect: Flashy Disappearance.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Widowiskowe Zniknięcie
Spell Effect: Flashy Disappearance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.YgbYvkLvnWJ4WfEA]{Widowiskowe Zniknięcie}

Tworzysz kłąb kolorowego dymu, który szybko się rozprasza, a ty stajesz się tymczasowo niewidzialny. Stajesz się niewykryty dla wszystkich istot, chyba że posiadają one zdolność do widzenia niewidzialnych istot. Biegniesz. Na koniec swojego ruchu, jeśli masz osłonę, większą osłonę lub przysłonięcie, podejmij się testu Skradania Się celem Schowania Się. Zyskujesz premię statusową +2 do tego testu Skradania Się. Następnie niewidzialnośc się kończy i stajesz się postrzegany lub schowany dla wszystkich istot w oparciu o twoją próbę Schowania Się, jeśli się jej podjąłeś.

Spell Effect: Fleet Step.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Zwiewny Krok
Spell Effect: Fleet Step.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.aEM2cttJ2eYcLssW]{Zwiewny Krok}

Zyskujesz premię statusową +30 stóp do swojej Prędkości.

Spell Effect: Fly.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.A2JfEKe6BZcTG1S8]{Fly}

Spell Effect: Font of Serenity.description:

Spell Effect: Foresight.description:

Kiedy działa przeczucie, cel zyskuje premię statusową +2 do rzutów inicjatywy i nie ma opuszczonej gardy przeciw niewykrytym istotom ani w wyniku flankowania.
