Spell Effect: Glimpse Weakness.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.cNnHV97gPqxJ3Rrr]{Glimpse Weakness}

You deal additional precision damage equal to 1 + this spell's rank, and then the spell ends.

Spell Effect: Glutton's Jaws.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Glutton's Jaws
Spell Effect: Glutton's Jaws.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.SdXFiQ4Py8761sNO]{Glutton's Jaws}

You gain temporary Hit Points.

Spell Effect: Goodberry.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Goodberry
Spell Effect: Goodberry.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.vQuwLqtFFYt0K15N]{Cornucopia}.

You are holding one or more goodberries, which remain fresh for the duration of the spell.

You can consume one or more goodberries from the same casting with an Interact action to regain 1k6+4 Hit Points per goodberry.

0.label: Pierwszy Cios bronią w tej rundzie

Spell Effect: Gray Shadow.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Gray Shadow
Spell Effect: Gray Shadow.description: The greater shadow's shadow hand Strike deals an additional 1k8 poison damage.

Spell Effect: Guidance.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Guidance
Spell Effect: Guidance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.izcxFQFwf3woCnFs]{Guidance}

You have divine guidance, granting you a +1 status bonus to one attack roll, Perception check, saving throw, or skill check you attempt before the duration ends. You choose which roll to use the bonus on before rolling. If you use the bonus, the spell ends. Either way, you are then temporarily immune for 1 hour.

Spell Effect: Guided Introspection.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Guided Introspection
Spell Effect: Guided Introspection.description:
The target gains a +1 status bonus to saving throws against emotion and fear.

Wywyższenie (+3)/strong> The status bonus increases by 1.

Spell Effect: Hallowed Ground.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Hallowed Ground
Spell Effect: Hallowed Ground.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.4bFxUA59xeq6Snhw]{Hallowed Ground}

Undead creatures have weakness to vitality damage while in the area.

Spell Effect: Hand of the Apprentice.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Hand of the Apprentice
Spell Effect: Hand of the Apprentice.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.bSDTWUIvgXkBaEv8]{Hand of the Apprentice}

You take advantage of one of the most fundamental lessons of magic to levitate and propel your weapon. You hurl a held melee weapon with which you are trained at the target, making a spell attack roll. On a success, you deal the weapon's damage as if you had hit with a melee Strike, but adding your spellcasting ability modifier to damage, rather than your Strength modifier. On a critical success, you deal double damage, and you add the weapon's critical specialization effect. Regardless of the outcome, the weapon flies back to you and returns to your hand.

Spell Effect: Harrowing.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Harrowing
Spell Effect: Harrowing.description:
Krytyczny Sukces The target gains agency over fate and chance while in the pursuit of their goal, gaining a "wild card." Randomly determine a harrow suit, either by rolling 1k6 or by drawing a card from a full harrow deck, and then consult the Associated Suit Checks table below. At any point during harrowing's duration, the creature can expend this wild card to immediately reroll any associated check they just made, gaining a +4 status bonus to the reroll. They must use the second result. Once this reroll is taken and the wild card is spent, the harrowing ritual's effects end.

Sukces As critical success, but the wild card does not grant a status bonus to the reroll.

Porażka As success, but the wild card instead grants a –4 status penalty to the reroll.

Spell Effect: Haste.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Haste
Spell Effect: Haste.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.o6YCGx4lycsYpww4]{Przyspieszenie}

The target gains the quickened condition and can use the extra action each round only for Strike and Stride actions.

Spell Effect: Healer's Blessing.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Healer's Blessing
Spell Effect: Healer's Blessing.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rhJyqB9g3ziImQgM]{Healer's Blessing}

When the target regains Hit Points from a healing vitality spell, it regains 2 additional Hit Points. The target regains additional Hit Points from healer's blessing only the first time it regains HP from a given healing spell, so a spell that heals the creature repeatedly over a duration would restore additional Hit Points only once.

Spell Effect: Heroism.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Heroism
Spell Effect: Heroism.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.KqvqNAfGIE5a9wSv]{Heroism}

Tapping into your inner heroism, you get a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, Perception checks, saving throws, and skill checks.

Spell Effect: Hidden Mind.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Hidden Mind
Spell Effect: Hidden Mind.description: Powerful wards hide a creature from magic that would spy on it or affect its mind. The target gains a +4 status bonus to saves against mental effects. Hidden mind attempts to counteract any detection, revelation, and scrying effects as if its spell rank were 1 higher than its actual rank. On a success, the effect functions normally except that it detects nothing about the target and its possessions. For instance, detect magic would still detect other magic in the area, but not any magic on the target.

Spell Effect: Hidebound.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Hidebound
Spell Effect: Hidebound.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.3TuGuGZqyOBmWp7N]{Hidebound}

The target gains resistance to physical damage, except adamantine, until the beginning of its next turn.

Spell Effect: Hippocampus Retreat.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Hippocampus Retreat
Spell Effect: Hippocampus Retreat.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wSK0wtn8iHShYT9y]{Hippocampus Retreat}

If you already have a swim Speed, you can Swim up to your Speed with a +10-foot circumstance bonus. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your AC against reactions triggered by this movement.

Spell Effect: Hymn of Healing.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Hymn of Healing
Spell Effect: Hymn of Healing.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gSUQlTDYoLDGAsCP]{Hymn of Healing}

The target gains fast healing. When you Cast the Spell and the first time each round you Sustain the Spell, the target gains temporary Hit Points, which last for 1 round.

Spell Effect: Hyperfocus.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Hyperfocus
Spell Effect: Hyperfocus.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XhgMx9WC6NfXd9RP]{Hyperfocus}.

The target gains a +1 status bonus to Perception checks attempted with any of its precise senses.

Spell Effect: Ill Omen.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Ill Omen
Spell Effect: Ill Omen.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.6ZIKB0151LUR19Rw]{Ill Omen}

Porażka The first time during the duration that the target attempts an attack roll or skill check, it must roll twice and use the worse result.

Krytyczna Porażka Every time during the duration that the target attempts an attack roll or skill check, it must roll twice and use the worse result.

Spell Effect: Illusory Disguise.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Iluzoryczne Przebranie
Spell Effect: Illusory Disguise.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.i35dpZFI7jZcRoBo]{Iluzoryczne Przebranie}

Cel zyskuje premię statusową +4 do testów Oszukiwania na rzecz zapobiegania próbom przejrzenia przebrania przez innych i zyskuje możliwość dodawania swojego poziomu do takich testów Oszukiwania, nawet jeśli jest niewyszkolony.

Spell Effect: Imitate Fauna.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Imitate Fauna
Spell Effect: Imitate Fauna.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.HkjeegDsA5Wq0hR2]{Imitate Fauna}

The target gains a +4 status bonus to Deception checks to prevent other animals from seeing through their disguise

Spell Effect: Impeccable Flow.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Impeccable Flow
Spell Effect: Impeccable Flow.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8VzbumNyMEdSzZSz]{Impeccable Flow}

You gain a +1 status bonus to Perception checks, saving throws, and skill checks.

Spell Effect: Impeccable Flow (Critical.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Impeccable Flow (Critical Failure Effect)
Spell Effect: Impeccable Flow (Critical.description:
Zapewniany przez critically failing @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8VzbumNyMEdSzZSz]{Impeccable Flow}

You attune yourself to an underlying cosmic order to the world. While you remain in tune with this power, you gain a +1 status bonus to Perception checks, saving throws, and skill checks. If you critically fail any check while under the effects of this spell, the bonus ends and you instead have a –1 status penalty to all checks for the remaining duration.

Spell Effect: Incendiary Ashes (Failure).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Incendiary Ashes (Porażka)
Spell Effect: Incendiary Ashes (Failure).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.OTd17oXwJH9qb1cS]{Incendiary Ashes}

The creature has weakness to fire 3 for 1 minute.

Spell Effect: Incendiary Ashes (Success).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Incendiary Ashes (Sukces)
Spell Effect: Incendiary Ashes (Success).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.OTd17oXwJH9qb1cS]{Incendiary Ashes}

The creature has weakness to fire 3 until the start of its next turn.

Spell Effect: Incendiary Aura.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Incendiary Aura
Spell Effect: Incendiary Aura.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.AspA30tzKCHFWRf0]{Incendiary Aura}

Each time a creature within the emanation takes fire damage, it catches on fire, taking @Damage[(ceil(@item.level/2)+1)d4[persistent,fire]] damage.

Spell Effect: Infectious Melody.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Infectious Melody
Spell Effect: Infectious Melody.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.mUz3wqbMQ5JQ06M5]{Infectious Melody}

Sukces For 1 round, the creature can communicate only by singing along to the melody. It can speak only on its turn, and it must take the Perform action when it does. The result of the Performance check determines how well it sang, but it stills communicate the information regardless of the result, which has no further mechanical impact than the time spent to take the action. A single Perform check is sufficient for any amount of speaking on the creature's turn. This effect might interfere with verbal components of spells or other linguistic abilities that rely on precise speech; in order to use such an ability successfully, the creature must succeed at a @Check[flat|dc:5].

In addition, the creature takes a –2 status penalty on linguistic Intimidation checks, as singing its threats saps away some of the menace. The creature's constant humming of the tune also makes it nearly impossible for the creature to remain undetected.

Porażka As success, but the duration is 3 rounds.

Krytyczna Porażka As success, but the duration is 1 hour.

Spell Effect: Infuse Vitality.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Infuse Vitality
Spell Effect: Infuse Vitality.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.2iQKhCQBijhj5Rf3]{Infuse Vitality}.

Each target's unarmed and weapon Strikes deal extra vitality damage.

Spell Effect: Inner Upheaval.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Inner Upheaval
Spell Effect: Inner Upheaval.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ZL8NTvB22NeEWhVG]{Inner Upheaval}

You gain a +1 status bonus to your attack rolls with the Strikes, and the Strikes deal 1k6 extra damage of the chosen type.

Wywyższenie (+4) The extra damage increases by 1k6.

Spell Effect: Inscrutable Mask.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Inscrutable Mask
Spell Effect: Inscrutable Mask.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.YQWq1DZuLRk32M3h]{Inscrutable Mask}

You shroud your form and features in an impenetrable mask of shadow. The mask grants you a +1 status bonus to Deception checks to Lie or Feint, Intimidation checks to Demoralize, and Stealth checks to Hide in areas of dim light or darkness.

Spell Effect: Insect Form (Ant).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Insect Form (Ant)
Spell Effect: Insect Form (Ant).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XI6Lzd2B5pernkPd]{Insect Form}

You envision a simple bug and transform into a Medium animal battle form. When you cast this spell, choose a form.

You can decide the specific type of animal (such as such as a ladybug or scarab for beetle), but this has no effect on the form's Size or statistics. While in this form, you gain the animal trait. You can Dismiss this spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 10 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +13, and your damage bonus is +2. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony} condition). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +13, unless your own is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the form you choose:

  • Ant
    • Speed 30 feet, climb Speed 30 feet;
    • Melee 1 mandibles, Damage 2k6 bludgeoning.

Wywyższenie (4.)/strong> Your battle form is Large, and your attacks have 10-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 15 temporary HP, attack modifier +16, damage bonus +6, and Athletics +16.

Wywyższenie (5.)/strong> Your battle form is Huge, and your attacks have 15-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 20 temporary HP, attack modifier +18, damage bonus +2 and double damage dice (including persistent damage), and Athletics +20.

Spell Effect: Inside Ropes (3rd level).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Inside Ropes (3. level)
Spell Effect: Inside Ropes (3rd level).description: The creature gains a +1 item bonus to Athletics checks to Climb while using the guts.

Spell Effect: Inspire Heroics (Courage,.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Inspire Heroics (Courage, +2)
Spell Effect: Inspire Heroics (Courage,.description:
Zapewniany przez succeeding on @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.kF0rs9mCPvJGfAZE]{Fortissimo Composition} to enhance @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IAjvwqgiDr3qGYxY]{Courageous Anthem}.

You are inspired by words or tunes of encouragement. You gain a +2 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saves against fear effects.

Spell Effect: Inspire Heroics (Courage,.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Inspire Heroics (Courage, +3)
Spell Effect: Inspire Heroics (Courage,.description:

Spell Effect: Inspire Heroics (Defense,.description:

Note: resistance is not automatically added.

You bolster your allies' physical strength with a hearty exhortation. You and your allies gain a +2 status bonus to Athletics checks and to their DCs against Athletics skill actions such as Disarm, Shove, and Trip.

Note: bonus to DCs is not automatically added.

Spell Effect: Juvenile Companion.description: The creature becomes Tiny (if it was larger), and its reach is reduced to 0 feet. All of its Speeds are halved (to a minimum Speed of 5 feet), and it gains weakness 5 to physical damage.

Spell Effect: Keen Smell.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Keen Smell
Spell Effect: Keen Smell.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.SXmEI4kVWVSagK4H]{Keen Smell}

Spell Effect: Knock.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Knock
Spell Effect: Knock.description:

Knock grants a +4 status bonus to any creature that tries to open the target door, lock, or container with an Athletics or a Thievery check.

Spell Effect: Lashunta's Life Bubble.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Lashunta's Life Bubble
Spell Effect: Lashunta's Life Bubble.description: You gain a +1 status bonus to saves against inhaled dangers.

Spell Effect: Lashunta's Life Bubble (He.description:
You gain a +1 status bonus to saves against inhaled dangers.

Spell Effect: Lay on Hands.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Nakładanie Rąk
Spell Effect: Lay on Hands.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zNN9212H2FGfM7VS]{Nakładanie Rąk}

Jeśli cel jest twoim sojusznikiem, zyskuje dodatkowo premię statusową +2 do KP na 1 rundę.

Spell Effect: Lay on Hands (Vs. Undead).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Nakładanie Rąk (Przeciw Nieumarłym)
Spell Effect: Lay on Hands (Vs. Undead).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zNN9212H2FGfM7VS]{Nakładanie Rąk}

Jeśli cel jest nieumarłym i odniesie porażkę na podstawowym rzucie obronnym Krzepy, ponosi dodatkowo karę statusową –2 do KP na 1 rundę.

Spell Effect: Leaden Steps.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Leaden Steps
Spell Effect: Leaden Steps.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.2tHYKoVc5YhSewDO]{Leaden Steps}

The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.D5mg6Tc7Jzrj6ro7]{Przeciążony} and has a weakness to electricity.

Spell Effect: Levitate.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Levitate
Spell Effect: Levitate.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.fI20AVwOzJMHXRdo]{Levitate}.

You take a –2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls while floating in the air. You can spend an Interact action to stabilize yourself and negate this penalty for the remainder of the turn.

Spell Effect: Life Connection.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Life Connection
Spell Effect: Life Connection.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.HIY4XUJZKmFLAJTn]{Life Connection}.

You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.5V49l0K460CcvBOO]{Defend Life} reaction; once you use the reaction, the spell ends.

Spell Effect: Life's Fresh Bloom.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Life's Fresh Bloom
Spell Effect: Life's Fresh Bloom.description: You gains a +5-foot status bonus to your Speed.

Spell Effect: Life-Giving Form.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Życiodajna Forma
Spell Effect: Life-Giving Form.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9kOI14Jep97TzGO7]{Życiodajna Forma}

Your body exudes bright light like a torch. You gain resistance to precision damage and weakness to void damage, and your unarmed Strikes deal extra vitality damage.

Spell Effect: Lift Nature's Caul (Bonus).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Lift Nature's Caul (Bonus)
Spell Effect: Lift Nature's Caul (Bonus).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.6GjJtLJnwC18Y0aZ]{Lift Nature's Caul}

The creature gains a +1 status bonus to Will saving throws and attack rolls.

Spell Effect: Light.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Światło
Spell Effect: Light.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.WBmvzNDfpwka3qT4]{Światło}

Przyczepiasz światło do godzącej się istoty, sprawiając, że będzie ono unosić się przy niej nawet kiedy ta się przemieści.

Spell Effect: Litany of Depravity.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Litany of Depravity
Spell Effect: Litany of Depravity.description:
Granted by litany of depravity

You gain weakness 7 to unholy.

Wywyższenie (+1) The weakness increases by 1.

Spell Effect: Litany of Righteousness.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Litany of Righteousness
Spell Effect: Litany of Righteousness.description:
Granted by litany of righteousness.

You gain weakness 7 to holy.

Wywyższenie (+1) The weakness increases by 1.

Spell Effect: Litany of Self-Interest.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Litany of Self-Interest
Spell Effect: Litany of Self-Interest.description: Granted by failing the save against litany of Self-Interest

Spell Effect: Loremaster's Etude.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Loremaster's Etude
Spell Effect: Loremaster's Etude.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.5Pc55FGGqVpIAJ62]{Loremaster's Etude}

Roll the triggering Recall Knowledge skill check twice and use the higher result.

Spell Effect: Lucky Number.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Lucky Number
Spell Effect: Lucky Number.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rDDYGY2ekZ1yVv7q]{Lucky Number}.

You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.kUME7DMhhHH6eIiH]{That's My Number} reaction; once you use the reaction, the spell ends.

Spell Effect: Magic Stone.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Magic Stone
Spell Effect: Magic Stone.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9u6X9ykhzG11NK1n]{Magic Stone}

The stones become +1 striking disrupting sling bullets.

Spell Effect: Magic's Vessel.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Magic's Vessel
Spell Effect: Magic's Vessel.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.u4FGIUQgruLjml7J]{Magic's Vessel}.

The target gains a +1 status bonus to saving throws.

Spell Effect: Magic's Vessel (Resistance.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Magic's Vessel (Resistance)
Spell Effect: Magic's Vessel (Resistance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.u4FGIUQgruLjml7J]{Magic's Vessel}

The target gains resistance to damage from spells equal to the spell's rank.

Spell Effect: Mantle of the Frozen Heart.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Mantle of the Frozen Heart (Ice Glide)
Spell Effect: Mantle of the Frozen Heart.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.CcXtbTxtdV9MKQfu]{Mantle of the Frozen Heart}

You surround yourself in a mantle of frigid ice magic, and your skin and armor morph into cold blue ice. Freezing air emanates from your body, sending a chill down anyone's spine who draws too close and leaving a fine dusting of frost in your wake. As a single action, which has the concentrate trait, you can change one of your chosen abilities to a different option from the list.

  • Ice Glide Ice trails from your feet for an instant as you move, allowing you to skate rapidly along the ice. You don't need to Balance on ice, and you ignore difficult terrain caused by ice or snow. While moving along a smooth surface, you gain a +20-foot status bonus to your land Speed.

Spell Effect: Mantle of the Frozen Heart.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Mantle of the Frozen Heart (Icy Claws)
Spell Effect: Mantle of the Frozen Heart.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.CcXtbTxtdV9MKQfu]{Mantle of the Frozen Heart}

You surround yourself in a mantle of frigid ice magic, and your skin and armor morph into cold blue ice. Freezing air emanates from your body, sending a chill down anyone's spine who draws too close and leaving a fine dusting of frost in your wake. As a single action, which has the concentrate trait, you can change one of your chosen abilities to a different option from the list.

  • Icy Claws Your hands morph into vicious, piercing claws of ice useful for attacking or climbing. As long as you have both hands free, you gain a climb Speed equal to your land Speed. You gain a claw unarmed attack with the agile and finesse traits, in the brawling weapon group. Your claw attack deals 1k6 piercing damage as its base damage, plus an additional 2k6 cold damage.

Spell Effect: Mantle of the Magma Heart.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Mantle of the Magma Heart (Enlarging Eruption)
Spell Effect: Mantle of the Magma Heart.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.j2kfNBFpLa0JjVr8]{Mantle of the Magma Heart}

You surround yourself in a mantle of blazing fire magic, and your skin and anything you're wearing morphs into burning hot lava. The air around you swelters with heat, and tiny sparks of flame dance behind you as you pass. As a single action, which has the concentrate trait, you can change one of your chosen abilities to a different option from the list.

  • Enlarging Eruption You erupt in lava, which clings to you and hardens, causing your body to swell and burst until you grow to size Large. You're clumsy 1. Your reach increases by 5 feet (or by 10 feet if you started out Tiny), and you gain a +2 status bonus to melee damage. You can't choose this option if you're already Large or larger.

Spell Effect: Mantle of the Magma Heart.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Mantle of the Magma Heart (Fiery Grasp)
Spell Effect: Mantle of the Magma Heart.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.j2kfNBFpLa0JjVr8]{Mantle of the Magma Heart}

You surround yourself in a mantle of blazing fire magic, and your skin and anything you're wearing morphs into burning hot lava. The air around you swelters with heat, and tiny sparks of flame dance behind you as you pass. As a single action, which has the concentrate trait, you can change one of your chosen abilities to a different option from the list.

  • Fiery Grasp Your hands swell and grow with lava. You gain a lava fist unarmed attack in the brawling weapon group. Your lava fists deal 1k8 bludgeoning damage as their base damage, plus an additional 2k6 fire damage and 1k6 persistent fire damage.

Spell Effect: Mantle of the Unwavering H.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Mantle of the Unwavering Heart
Spell Effect: Mantle of the Unwavering H.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.3526YUgCvB5ZsKuX]{Mantle of the Unwavering Heart}

  • Evergreen Vitality You gain fast healing 3 and a +2 bonus to saves against poison and disease. This effect has the healing and vitality traits.
  • Overwhelming Perfume (aura, olfactory) A cloud of potent floral scent surrounds you in a 15-foot emanation. Creatures in the aura can't benefit from the scent ability and are sickened 1 as long as they remain in the aura. The sickness is a disease effect.
  • Towering Trunk You grow to a considerable height. Increase your size to Large. You're clumsy 1. Your reach increases by 5 feet (or by 10 feet if you started out Tiny), and you gain a grasping branch unarmed attack; this attack is in the brawling weapon group and deals 2k8 bludgeoning damage plus Grab.
  • Unyielding Will Your mind becomes incredibly resilient to change. You're immune to being fascinated, and you get a +1 bonus to saves and DCs against mental effects.

Spell Effect: Mimic Undead.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Mimic Undead
Spell Effect: Mimic Undead.description: You take death and wrap it about you like a cloak-your colors wash out and your skin grows cold to the touch. Your heartbeat, breathing, and similar life functions become very difficult to detect. Senses such as lifesense detect you as undead unless a creature succeeds at a Perception check against the spell's DC, and on a failed check, they don't detect you at all if they only sense living creatures. Detection spells that specifically sense living creatures must succeed at a counteract check against mimic undead to detect you. You gain a +4 status bonus to Impersonate an undead but physically intact version of yourself and can add your level as your proficiency bonus even if you're untrained. You don't gain these benefits to Impersonate any other sort of undead. Mindless undead usually don't have a reason to even attempt the Perception check to notice your Impersonation unless you interact with them in some way.

Spell Effect: Mind Swap (Critical Succes.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Mind Swap (Krytyczny Sukces)
Spell Effect: Mind Swap (Critical Succes.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.RWwiFnjxoJXn7H6D]{Mind Swap}

The mind swap is unusually smooth, and the targets gain a +4 circumstance bonus to Deception checks to Impersonate each other.

1.label: Impersonate the Other Target of Mind Swap

Spell Effect: Mind of Menace.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Mind of Menace
Spell Effect: Mind of Menace.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.fPlFRu4dp09qJs3K]{Mind of Menace}

You gain the Fight with Fear reaction.

Spell Effect: Mirecloak.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Mirecloak
Spell Effect: Mirecloak.description: You wrap the targeted creatures in thin, sickly green shrouds that sap information from attackers. The shroud settles about each target's shoulders, granting a +1 status bonus to AC and a +2 status bonus to Stealth checks, both only while the target is in dim light or darkness.

Spell Effect: Mirror Image.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Lustrzane Odbicia
Spell Effect: Mirror Image.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.j8vIoIEWElvpwkcI]{Lustrzane Odbicia}

Trzy iluzoryczne odbicia ciebie samego wirują w twoim polu, potencjalnie przyciągając ciosy napastników. Każdy atak, który miałby cię trafić ma losową szansę na trafienie zamiast tego jednego z twoich obrazów. Jeśli obecne są wszystkie trzy obrazy, istnieje jedna czwarta szansa na trafienie cię (1 na [[/r 1d4]]{1k4}). Jeśli pozostają dwa, istnieje jedna trzecia szansy na trafienie cię (1-2 na [[/r 1d6]]{1k6}). Jeśli pozostaje tylko jeden obraz, szansa wynosi jedna druga (1-3 na [[/r 1d6]]{1k6}).

Kiedy obraz zostanie trafiony, jest niszczony. Jeśli atak nie trafia twojej KP ale nie jest krytyczną porażką, niszczy on obraz, ale nie wywiera żadnego dodatkowego efektu (nawet jeśli normalnie atak wywoływałby efekt przy porażce). Jeśli atak jest krytycznym sukcesem i trafiłby jeden z twoich obrazów, jeden z twoich obrazów jest nieszczony a atak staje się krytycznym sukcesem wymierzonym w ciebie. Kiedy wszystkie obrazy zostaną zniszczone zaklęcie kończy się.

Spell Effect: Monstrosity Form (Cave Wor.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Monstrosity Form (Cave Worm)
Spell Effect: Monstrosity Form (Cave Wor.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8AMvNVOUEtxBCDvJ]{Monstrosity Form}

You transform into the shape of a legendary monster, assuming a Huge battle form. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. While in this form, you gain the animal trait. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 20 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +28, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +30, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of monster you choose:

  • Cave Worm
    • Speed 40 feet, burrow 30 feet, swim 20 feet;
    • Melee 1 jaws (reach 10 feet), Damage 2k12+20 piercing;
    • Melee 1 stinger (agile, reach 10 feet), Damage 2k8+15 piercing plus 2k6 persistent poison;
    • Melee 1 body (reach 10 feet) Damage 2k8+20 bludgeoning;
    • Inexorable You automatically recover from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Sparaliżowany}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony} conditions at the end of each of your turns. You're also immune to being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Unieruchomiony} and ignore difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain.

Wywyższenie (9.)/strong> You instead gain AC = 22 + your level, 25 temporary HP, attack modifier +31, increase damage by one damage die, and Athletics +33.

Spell Effect: Monstrosity Form (Kaiju).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Monstrosity Form (Kaiju)
Spell Effect: Monstrosity Form (Kaiju).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.1ul2dasQBdlaMEC5]{Heart of the Kaiju}

You take on a kaiju form. The battle form is Gargantuan size with the following specific abilities.

Kaiju Speed 40 feet; physical resistance 5;

Melee 1 jaws (reach 20 feet), Damage 3k12+20 piercing;

Melee 1 claws (agile, reach 20 feet), Damage 3k8+20 slashing;

Breath Weapon 2 (evocation, primal) Each creature in a 60-foot cone takes 15k6 damage (of your chosen damage type), with a basic Reflex save against your spell DC. Once activated, your breath weapon can't be used again for 1k4 rounds.

Spell Effect: Monstrosity Form (Phoenix).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Monstrosity Form (Phoenix)
Spell Effect: Monstrosity Form (Phoenix).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8AMvNVOUEtxBCDvJ]{Monstrosity Form}

You transform into the shape of a legendary monster, assuming a Huge battle form. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. While in this form, you gain the beast trait. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 20 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +28, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +30, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of monster you choose:

  • Phoenix
    • Speed 30 feet, fly 90 feet;
    • Melee 1 beak (reach 15 feet), Damage 2k6+12 piercing plus 2k4 fire and 2k4 persistent fire;
    • Melee 1 talon (agile, reach 15 feet), Damage 2k8+12 slashing;
    • Shroud of Flame (aura, fire, primal) 20 feet. You gain an aura of fire that extends out from you. A creature that enters or ends its turn within the aura takes @Damage[2d6[fire]] damage. A creature can take this damage only once per turn. You can activate or deactivate this aura with a Sustain action.

Wywyższenie (9.)/strong> You instead gain AC = 22 + your level, 25 temporary HP, attack modifier +31, increase damage by one damage die, and Athletics +33.

Spell Effect: Monstrosity Form (Sea Serp.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Monstrosity Form (Sea Serpent)
Spell Effect: Monstrosity Form (Sea Serp.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8AMvNVOUEtxBCDvJ]{Monstrosity Form}

You transform into the shape of a legendary monster, assuming a Huge battle form. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. While in this form, you gain the animal trait. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 20 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +28, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +30, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of monster you choose:

  • Sea Serpent
    • Speed 20 feet, swim 90 feet;
    • Melee 1 jaws (reach 15 feet), Damage 2k12+20 piercing;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 25 feet), Damage 2k8+20 bludgeoning;
    • Spine Rake 2 (move) You extend your spines and Swim or Stride. Each creature you're adjacent to at any point during your movement takes @Damage[(4d8+10)[slashing]] damage (@Check[reflex|against:spell|basic] against your spell DC).

Wywyższenie (9.) You instead gain AC = 22 + your level, 25 temporary HP, attack modifier +31, increase damage by one damage die, and Athletics +33.

Spell Effect: Moon Frenzy.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Moon Frenzy
Spell Effect: Moon Frenzy.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.YtesyvfAIwXOqISq]{Moon Frenzy}

Targets gain temporary Hit Points, a +10-foot status bonus to their Speeds, and weakness to silver. They also grow vicious fangs and claws, which are unarmed attacks. If a target is in the light of a full moon, it also grows by one size if it were Medium or smaller. This increases the reach of a Medium or Tiny creature by 5 feet.

Spell Effect: Mountain Resilience.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Mountain Resilience
Spell Effect: Mountain Resilience.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.2BV2yYPfVJ5zirZt]{Mountain Resilience}

The target's skin hardens like stone. It gains resistance 5 to physical damage, except adamantine. Each time the target is hit by a bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing attack, mountain resilience's duration decreases by 1 minute.

Spell Effect: Musical Accompaniment.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Muzyczny Akompaniament
Spell Effect: Musical Accompaniment.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.mnhuvqTIELcpJOFX]{Muzyczny Akompaniament}

Muzyka zapewnia premię statusową +1 do testów Występów. Tak długo, jak gra muzyka, ponosisz karę –4 do testów Skradania Się.

Spell Effect: Musical Shift.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Musical Shift
Spell Effect: Musical Shift.description:
Flat (key signature) Whenever an enemy critically fails at a Strike, saving throw, or skill check, they fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony} in addition to other effects from the critical failure.

Natural (key signature) Enemies take a –2 status penalty to attack rolls.

Sharp (key signature) Whenever an enemy takes piercing or slashing damage, they also take 2k6 persistent bleed damage.

Double (time signature) You and your allies become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Przyspieszony} and can use the extra action each round only for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap}, Stand, Step, or Stride actions.

Quadruple (time signature) You and your allies gain a +2 status bonus to attack rolls.

Triple (time signature) You and your allies gain a +2 status bonus to Armor Class and Reflex saving throws.

Spell Effect: Mystic Armor.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Mistyczna Zbroja
Spell Effect: Mystic Armor.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.aAbfKn8maGjJjk2W]{Mistyczną Zbroję}

Ochraniasz się za pomocą połyskującej magicznej energii zyskując premię przedmiotu +1 do KP plus maksymalny możliwy modyfikator Zręczności +5. Kiedy nosisz mistyczną zbroję, używasz swojej biegłości w obronie bez pancerza do obliczania swojej KP.

Spell Effect: Nature Incarnate.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Nature Incarnate
Spell Effect: Nature Incarnate.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ZXwxs5tRjEGrjAJT]{Nature Incarnate}

The primal power of the world flows through you. You transform into an incarnation of nature, either a green man or a kaiju. Your battle form is Medium for a green man or Gargantuan (30-foot-by-30-foot space) for a kaiju. While in this form, you gain the plant trait (for a green man) or the beast trait (for a kaiju). You can Dismiss the spell. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 25 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 30 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +34, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +36, unless your own is higher.

You gain specific abilities based on the incarnation you choose:

  • Green Man
    • Speed 40 feet, climb 40 feet;
    • Melee 1 vines (reach 30 feet, versatile P), Damage 6k8+12 bludgeoning;
    • Ranged 1 thorns (range 100 feet), Damage 6k6+6 piercing;
    • Green Caress (aura, primal) 60 feet. Enemies other than plants must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|against:spell] against your spell DC or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} for 1 round (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} on a critical failure).
  • Kaiju
    • Speed 50 feet; resistance 5 to physical damage;
    • Melee 1 jaws (reach 30 feet), Damage 6k10+10 piercing;
    • Melee 1 claws (agile, reach 30 feet), Damage 6k8+8 slashing;
    • Melee 1 foot (agile, reach 15 feet), Damage 6k6+10 bludgeoning;
    • Unstoppable You are immune to being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Unieruchomiony} and ignore difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain;
    • Trample 3 You move up to double your Speed and move through the spaces of Huge or smaller creatures, trampling each creature whose space you enter. A trampled creature takes foot damage with a @Check[reflex|against:spell|basic] save against your spell DC.

Spell Effect: Necromancer's Generosity.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Szczodrość Nekromanty
Spell Effect: Necromancer's Generosity.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.JUJYVbtNNFdvyrBS]{Szczodrość Nekromanty}

Twój nieumarły sługus zyskuje na czas trwania zaklęcia premię statusową +2 przeciw efektom witalności.

Spell Effect: Necrotize (Legs).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Necrotize (Legs)
Spell Effect: Necrotize (Legs).description: The target's legs necrotize, as well as any other limbs associated with forms of movement, making it harder for the creature to move. The target takes a –10-foot status penalty to its Speeds.

Spell Effect: Nudge the Odds.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Szturchnięcie Szans
Spell Effect: Nudge the Odds.description:
Zapewniasz sobie nadnaturalne szczęście kartach, kościach i innych grach losowych. Zyskujesz premię statusową +1 do testów Obeznania w Grach na rzecz hazardu, a kiedy odniesiesz na takim teście krytyczną porażkę, uzyskujesz zamiast niej porażkę; zaklęcie to jest natomiast zbyt krótkotrwałe aby wykorzystać je do testu na rzecz Zarabiania Pieniędzy przez hazard.

Kiedy jesteś pod wpływem szturchnięcia szans, jeden z widocznych na twojej twarzy elementów aparycji, taki jak kosmyk włosów czy tęczówka oka, przyjmuje charakterystyczny złoty kolor; MG wybiera jaki, kiedy rzucasz zaklęcie. Zmiana ta przeciwstawia się wszelkim magicznym próbom jej zamaskowania, chociaż może być ukryta lub zakamuflowana niemagicznymi sposobami. Istota zauważająca tę zmianę, może rozpoznać to zaklęcie z użyciem Pozyskania Wiedzy. W związku z tym, że zapobiega ono wielkim przegranym, hazdziści uważają szturchnięcie szans za odrażającą formę oszustwa. Jeśli zostaniesz przyłapany na jego używaniu tego zaklęcia, najpewniej spotkają cię poważne konsekwencje, w zależności od tego kogo oszukałeś.

Wywyższenie (5.) Premia statusowa zwiększa się do +2 a czas trwania zwiększa się do twoich następnych codziennych przygotowań. Jeśli będziesz regularnie zużywać komórki zaklęć aby podtrzymywać zaklęcie, pozwala ci to na używanie go do testów wykonywanych na rzecz Zarabiania Pieniędzy podczas przestoju.

Spell Effect: Nymph's Token.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Nymph's Token
Spell Effect: Nymph's Token.description: Zapewniany przez holding the token created by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.pHrVvoTKygXeczVG]{Nymph's Token}

Spell Effect: Object Memory (Weapon).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Object Memory (Weapon)
Spell Effect: Object Memory (Weapon).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.RztmhJrLLQWoGVdB]{Object Memory}.

If you touch a weapon, your proficiency rank with that weapon temporarily increases to trained (if it is not already higher).

Wywyższenie (6.)/strong> Your proficiency rank increases to expert instead of trained.

Spell Effect: One with the Land.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: One with the Land
Spell Effect: One with the Land.description:
You merge with an adjacent natural feature with enough volume to fit you and your worn and held possessions, such as the ground or a large tree. Your merged form is visible within the feature, and creatures can target and attack you normally, though you have cover and can use it to Hide or Take Cover within the feature. You can cast spells while in the feature as long as they don't require line of effect beyond the feature. You can Dismiss the spell. While merged, you gain the following additional benefits.

  • You immediately become aware of the surrounding terrain features, and you gain tremorsense as an imprecise sense with a range of 200 feet.
  • You can make terrain vengeance Strikes by commanding plants, rocks, and other natural features to attack your foes. These are melee Strikes that use your spell attack roll, can target any creature within 60 feet of you, and deal 5k12 @Damage[5d12[bludgeoning]]{bludgeoning}, @Damage[5d12[piercing]]{piercing}, or @Damage[5d12[slashing]]{slashing} damage. You choose the damage type each time you make a terrain vengeance Strike.
  • By spending a single action, which has the concentrate trait, you can increase or decrease the environmental temperature changing it to either one step warmer than normal, one step colder than normal, or the normal temperature.
  • As a 2-action activity that has the concentrate trait, you can create or remove difficult terrain caused by natural terrain in a 20-foot burst within 200 feet. All of your alterations to the land end when the spell ends. Significant physical damage to the natural feature while you are inside it expels you and deals [[/r 10d6]]{10k6 damage} to you.

Spell Effect: Ooze Form (Black Pudding).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Ooze Form (Black Pudding)
Spell Effect: Ooze Form (Black Pudding).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.0gdZrT9lwO17EIxc]{Ooze Form}

You invoke all things that seep and ooze, your body dissolving into a thick slurry and then reconstituting itself into a Medium ooze battle form. When you first cast this spell, choose black pudding, gelatinous cube, gray ooze, or ochre jelly. While in this form, you gain the ooze trait. You can Dismiss the spell. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 7 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • You are immune to critical hits, precision damage, and visual effects.
  • Resistance 5 to acid, piercing, and slashing damage.
  • No vision and motion sense 30 feet. You can sense nearby motion through vibration and air movement as a precise sense.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +14, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +14, unless your own is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the ooze:

  • Black Pudding Speed 15 feet, climb 15 feet;
    • Melee 1 pseudopod, Damage 2k6+5 bludgeoning and 1k8 acid.

Wywyższenie (4.)/strong> Your battle form is Large, and your attacks have 10-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 30 temporary HP; resistance 7 to acid, piercing, and slashing; attack modifier +16; damage bonus +9; and Athletics +16. Your motion sense has a range of 40 feet.

Wywyższenie (5.)/strong> Your battle form is Huge, and your attacks have 15-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 40 temporary HP; resistance 10 to acid, piercing, and slashing; attack modifier +18; damage bonus +6 and double damage dice; and Athletics +20. Your motion sense has a range of 60 feet.

Wywyższenie (8.)/strong> Your battle form is Gargantuan (20-foot- by-20-foot space), and your attacks have 20-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 60 temporary HP; resistance 12 to acid, piercing, and slashing; attack modifier +28; damage bonus +13 and double damage dice; and Athletics +29. Your motion sense has a range of 60 feet.

Spell Effect: Open the Wall of Ghosts (C.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Open the Wall of Ghosts (Krytyczny Sukces)
Spell Effect: Open the Wall of Ghosts (C.description: You gain a +2 status bonus to Armor Class and saving throws.

Spell Effect: Organsight.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Organsight
Spell Effect: Organsight.description:
You see the target as though it's dissected and arrayed before you. For the duration, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus on Medicine checks against the target that depend on its organs, but a –2 circumstance penalty on Medicine checks depending on seeing its skin.

When you Cast the Spell, attempt a special Recall Knowledge check using Medicine to spot and discern a vital organ. If you have a Lore skill appropriate to the creature, you can use that skill instead of Medicine. If you succeed, the next time you deal piercing or slashing damage to the target with a Strike or spell, you deal 4k6 additional precision damage. Once on each of your subsequent turns, you can use a single action to attempt the special Recall Knowledge check again. The extra damage isn't cumulative, so making the check more than once before a Strike or spell has no extra benefit.

Wywyższenie (+1)/strong> The precision damage increases by [[/r 1d6]]{1k6}.

Spell Effect: Penumbral Disguise.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Penumbral Disguise
Spell Effect: Penumbral Disguise.description:
You wrap the target in shadows, granting them a +1 status bonus to Stealth checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Schować Się} while in dim light or darkness.

In addition, the shadows mask the creature's features. While the creature is in dim light or darkness, other creatures must succeed at a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} action against the spell's DC to discern details about the target's appearance. For example, without using Seek, other creatures can determine the target's general shape (such as humanoid), but they would need to Seek to determine the target's precise appearance or any other identifying information.

Creatures with darkvision can still see the target and their features normally. The target's normal appearance is revealed in bright light.

Wywyższenie (4.)/strong> The status bonus is +2. Creatures with darkvision can no longer discern details about the target while the target is in dim light or darkness without Seeking, though creatures with greater darkvision can still determine these details.

Wywyższenie (6.)/strong> As 4. level, except the status bonus is +3 and creatures without darkvision can't determine even general details about the target while the target is in dim light or darkness unless they successfully Seek the target; these creatures see a vague shadow instead. Even on a successful Seek, they only determine general features, though they can see details on a critical success.

Wywyższenie (8.)/strong> As 6. level, except the status bonus is +4 and even creatures with greater darkvision must Seek to discern details about the target while the target is in dim light or darkness.

Spell Effect: Pest Form.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Postać Szkodnika
Spell Effect: Pest Form.description:
Przemieniasz się w postać bojową Malutkiego zwierzęcia, takiego jak insekt, jaszczurka, kot czy szczur. Możesz określić dokładny typ stworzenia (na przykład szczur albo modliszka), ale nie ma to wpływu na Rozmiar i statystyki postaci. Będąc w tej postaci zyskujesz cechę zwierzę oraz nie możesz wykonywać Ciosów. Możesz Odwołać to zaklęcie.

Zyskujesz poniższe statystyki i zdolności:

  • KP = 15 + twój poziom. Ignorujesz kary do testów i redukcję Prędkości swojego pancerza.
  • Prędkość 20 stóp.
  • Podatność 5 na obrażenia fizyczne. (Jeśli odniesiesz w tej postaci obrażenia fizyczne, odnosisz 5 dodatkowych punktów obrażeń.)
  • Widzenie w słabym świetle i nieprecyzyjny zmysł węchu na 30 stóp.
  • Modyfikatory Akrobatyki i Skradania Się +10, chyba, że twoje własne są wyższe; Modyfikator Atletyki –4.

Wywyższenie (4.) Możesz zmienić się w latającą istotę, na przykład ptaka, co zapewnia ci Prędkość latania 20 stóp.

Spell Effect: Phase Bolt.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Phase Bolt
Spell Effect: Phase Bolt.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.5gophZ4AOKW4VW27]{Phase Bolt}

If the target has any circumstance bonuses to AC, reduce that bonus by 2 for this attack.

Spell Effect: Phase Familiar.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Phase Familiar
Spell Effect: Phase Familiar.description: Your familiar gains resistance to all damage and is immune to precision damage.

Spell Effect: Phoenix Ward.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Phoenix Ward
Spell Effect: Phoenix Ward.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.lJdAvY1sJyEmNDc6]{Phoenix Ward}

You raise a fiery shield around yourself, gaining resistance 10 to fire.

Spell Effect: Plant Form (Arboreal).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Plant Form (Arboreal)
Spell Effect: Plant Form (Arboreal).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zCcfPS4y5SrZzU2x]{Plant Form}

Taking inspiration from verdant creatures, you transform into a Large plant battle form. You must have space to expand into or the spell is lost. You can substitute a similar specific plant to turn into (such as a pitcher plant instead of a flytrap), but this has no effect on the form's Size or statistics. While in this form, you gain the plant trait. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 19 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 12 temporary Hit Points.
  • Resistance 10 to poison.
  • Low-light vision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +17, and your damage bonus is +11. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +19, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of plant you choose:

  • Arboreal
    • Speed 30 feet; you can speak in this form, but you still can't Cast a Spell or supply verbal components.
    • Melee 1 branch (reach 15 feet), Damage 2k10 bludgeoning;
    • Melee 1 foot, Damage 2k8 bludgeoning

Wywyższenie (6.)/strong> Your battle form is Huge, and the reach of your attacks increases by 5 feet. You instead gain AC = 22 + your level, 24 temporary HP, attack modifier +21, damage bonus +16, and Athletics +22.

Spell Effect: Plant Form (Flytrap).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zCcfPS4y5SrZzU2x]{Plant Form}

  • 12 temporary Hit Points.
  • Resistance 10 to poison.
  • Low-light vision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +17, and your damage bonus is +11. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +19, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of plant you choose:

  • Flytrap
    • Speed 15 feet; resistance 10 to acid;
    • Melee 1 leaf (reach 10 feet), Damage 2k8 piercing, and you can spend an action after a hit to Grab the target.

Wywyższenie (6.)/strong> Your battle form is Huge, and the reach of your attacks increases by 5 feet. You instead gain AC = 22 + your level, 24 temporary HP, attack modifier +21, damage bonus +16, and Athletics +22.

Spell Effect: Pocket Library.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Kieszonkowa Biblioteka
Spell Effect: Pocket Library.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.TjWHgXqPv5jywMti]{Kieszonkową Bibliotekę}

W trakcie trwania tego zaklęcia, kiedy wykonujesz test Pozyskiwania Wiedzy z użyciem wybranej umiejętności możesz wydobyć z międzywymiarowej biblioteki księgę. Jest to częścią akcji Pozyskiwania Wiedzy. Musisz mieć w tym celu wolną rękę. Księga pojawia się w twojej ręce, otwarta na adekwatnej stronie. Zapewnia ci to premię statusową +1 do testu Pozyskania Wiedzy. Jeśli wyrzucisz na tym teście krytyczną porażkę, zamiast tego osiągasz porażkę. Jeśli rzut zakończy się sukcesem a celem Pozyskania Wiedzy była istota, zyskujesz dodatkowe informacje lub szerszy kontekst dotyczący istoty.

Spell Effect: Practice Makes Perfect.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Practice Makes Perfect
Spell Effect: Practice Makes Perfect.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.HOj2YsTpkoMpYJH9]{Practice Makes Perfect}.

The target gains a +2 status bonus to the triggering check, or a +3 bonus if the target has master or better proficiency in the skill.

Spell Effect: Precious Metals.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Precious Metals
Spell Effect: Precious Metals.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.APTMURAW1N0Wpk4w]{Precious Metals}

Your deity blesses base metals to transform them into precious materials.
